intro: Fire the shot. Watch it fall
description:
Dive into a faster, brighter, and even more satisfying blast of hyper-casual action. Take on endless waves each packed with three quick challenges that test your aim, timing, and reactions. 

Your goal is simple: knock every green block into oblivion. Smash through glass panels, dodge shifting obstacles, and send pieces flying with clean, physics-driven precision.
With its vibrant visuals, smooth effects, and bold geometric style, this experience turns every shot into a burst of colour and motion. Conquer waves to earn gems, then unlock a variety of stylish new ball designs to personalise your play.
